spoutGL
spoutGL​()

Base class for OpenGL texture sharing using the NVIDIA GL/DX interop extensions.  This class should not be used directly because it is the base for the Spout, SpoutSender and SpoutReceiver classes.  Refer to the SpoutSDK class for documentation and details.

OpenGL shared texture

bool spoutGL::BindSharedTexture()

Bind OpenGL shared texture

Un-bind OpenGL shared texture

OpenGL texture share compatibility

For direct access if necessary
OpenSpout
bool spoutGL::OpenSpout(
bool bRetest
)

Initialize OpenGL and DX11 - Load extensions and check for availability and function - Open DirectX and check for availability - Compatibility test for use or GL/DX interop - Optionally re-test compatibility even if already initialized

DXGI_FORMAT textureformat
)

CloseDirectX
void spoutGL::CloseDirectX()

Close DirectX and free resources

CreateOpenGL
bool spoutGL::CreateOpenGL()

Create an OpenGL window and context for situations where there is none.  Not used if applications already have an OpenGL context.  Always call CloseOpenGL afterwards.

CloseOpenGL
bool spoutGL::CloseOpenGL()

Close OpenGL window

User registry settings recorded by "SpoutSettings"

User settings are retrieved in constructor and can be set for the application (except max senders which must be global)
